Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Nitsirusia tsinzesele tsiomulilo khukhupa ebilekeyi biatsio hasi
Toto Omundu ni Omukhayi muno wetsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Ne toto ye mwene ni omuloli khu ako
Ne toto ye alineshinani shiokhuyanza omwandu
Kho koo akorerwe olwa abali mubilindwa balilamusibwa mubafuu
Toto Nyasaye wabu Omulesi inyanga eyo aliba nende amakhuwa kabu boosi
